# Observability Reference

This document lists metrics emitted by the proxy and helpers.

### Metrics (Prometheus / OTEL)
- `ai_requests_total`  
  Total AI requests observed.

- `ai_token_usage`  
  Estimated token usage.

- `ai_latency_ttft`  
  Time to first token (seconds). Uses explicit buckets.

- `ai_chaos_injections`  
  Total chaos injections. Labels: `strategy`, `model`.

- `chaos_injection_skipped_total`  
  Skipped injections. Labels: `strategy_type`, `reason`.

- `chaos_error_codes_total`  
  Structured error codes. Labels: `error_code`, `strategy`.

### Tracing
Traces are exported via OTLP. Configure:
- `OTEL_EXPORTER_OTLP_ENDPOINT`
- `OTEL_SAMPLE_RATE`
